Class DumbTargettingEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • MoveableEntity
        • Enemy
          • DumbTargettingEnemy

  • public class DumbTargettingEnemy
extends Enemy
    This creates enemies that travel directly towards the players location. Upon hitting obstacles, the enemy will continue bumping into them until the direct path to the player changes. Filename: DumbTargettingEnemy.java Version History - version 1.0
    Since:
    20-11-2019 copyright: No Copyright Purpose
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ben Parker
